rateLimitDescription: Please wait before sending another message.
creditsDescription: Please add credits to continue using this feature.
authenticationDescription: Please log in to access this feature.
networkErrorDescription: Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection.
serverErrorDescription: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
invalidInputDescription: Please check your input and try again.
notFoundDescription: The requested resource was not found.
permissionDeniedDescription: You don't have permission to access this resource.
